channel.title: CVE Feed for Delower -- WP To Do
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delower -- WP To Do

item.title: CVE-2024-37539|2024-07-07T13:46:20.642Z -- delower -- wp%20to%20do
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Delower WP To Do allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP To Do: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Delower WP To Do allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP To Do: from n/a through 1.2.8.
